{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Dusk Ball |image = [[File:Dusk Ball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Dusk Ball''. |price = Variable |catchTime = 1s |catchRate = Variable (Depending on Time and Location) *+15% during night (6PM - 6AM) and in [[Dungeons]] *+0% during day (6AM - 6PM) and in all other locations |location =
*[[Dusk Ball#Shops|Shops]] *[[Dusk Ball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Dusk Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector. ==Details== A specialized Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it provides an increased catch rate at night and in [[Dungeons]] and catches Pokémon in 1s. ===Rates=== {| class="wikitable" |+ Dusk Ball |- ! Location !! Catch Chance Modifier |- | Night (6PM - 6AM) and in [[Dungeons]] || +15% |- | Day (6AM - 6PM) and in all other locations || +0% (Equal to Poké Ball) |- |} == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Berry Master#Trades|Goldenrod City]]|20 - 40 Random [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 1 Berries|Gen 1 Berries]]
5 - 15 Random [[File:Persim.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 2 Berries|Gen 2 Berries]]}} |} |} ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{LootItem|Aqua Hideout|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Iron Island|Epic}} {{LootItem|Mistralton Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Unova|Epic}} {{LootItem|Twist Mountain|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Poké Ball Factory|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lost Hotel|Epic}} {{LootItem|Frost Cavern|Epic}} {{LootItem|Terminus Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Kalos|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Diglett's Tunnel|Epic}} {{LootItem|Memorial Hill|Epic}} {{LootItem|Vast Poni Canyon|Epic}} {{LootItem|Galar Mine No. 2|Epic}} {{LootItem|Courageous Cavern|Epic}} {{LootItem|Brawlers' Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Roaring-Sea Caves|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lakeside Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Tunnel to the Top|Epic}} |} |}
